1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Utilities for association lists.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Base.List.Assoc
6  ( -- * Association list
7    assocBy,
8    assocExist,
9    lookupBy,
10    lookupSatisfy,
11    assocFinder,
12    -- $Assoc
13  
14    -- * Tuple-like operator
15    assocPick,
16    assocCut,
17    assocCut1,
18    assocRename1,
19    assocCompose, assocMeet,
20  
21    -- * Gather
22    Gather, gather, --gatherWith,
23    gatherToMap, gatherToMapSwap,
24    gatherToAssoc, gatherToAssocOrder,
25  ) where
26
27import qualified Data.Map                       as Map
28import qualified Data.Maybe                     as Maybe
29import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture       as O
30
31
32
33-- ----------------------  Association list
34
35-- $Assoc
36--
37--  /Examples/
38--
39--  Construct assoc list by splitting at char @\'a\'@.
40--
41--    >>> assocBy (`lookup` [('a', "A")]) "banana apple cocoa"
42--    ("b", [("A","n"), ("A","n"), ("A"," "), ("A","pple coco"), ("A","")])
43--    >>> assocBy (`lookup` [('a', "A")]) ""
44--    ("", [])
45--
46--  Check key exists.
47--
48--    >>> assocExist "b" [("a",1), ("b",2), ("c",3)]
49--    True
50--    >>> assocExist "e" [("a",1), ("b",2), ("c",3)]
51--    False
52--
53--  Lookup entry that satisfies @\'n\' \`elem\` \"banana\"@.
54--
55--    >>> lookupSatisfy 'n' [((`elem` "apple"), 1), ((`elem` "banana"), 2)]
56--    Just 2
57--
58--  Extract value in 'Maybe'.
59--
60--    >>> fromMaybe 0 (Just 12)
61--    12
62--    >>> fromMaybe 0 (Nothing)
63--    0
64
65-- | Construct assoc list by splitting base list.
66assocBy :: (a -> Maybe k) -> [a] -> ([a], [(k, [a])])
67assocBy p = lead [] where
68    lead ys []         = (reverse ys, [])
69    lead ys (x : xs)   = case p x of
70                           Nothing -> lead (x : ys) xs
71                           Just k  -> (reverse ys, ass k [] xs)
72
73    ass k ys []        = [(k, reverse ys)]
74    ass k ys (x : xs)  = case p x of
75                           Nothing -> ass k (x : ys) xs
76                           Just k' -> (k, reverse ys) : ass k' [] xs
77
78-- | Check which given key is there in assoc list.
79assocExist :: (Eq k) => k -> [(k, a)] -> Bool
80assocExist k a = Maybe.isJust $ lookup k a
81
82-- | Lookup association list using Boolean function.
83--
84--   >>> lookupBy (> (4 :: Int)) [(1, "one"), (3, "three"), (5, "five")]
85--   Just "five"
86--
87lookupBy :: O.Test a -> [(a, b)] -> Maybe b
88lookupBy p = loop where
89    loop [] = Nothing
90    loop ((k, v) : xs)
91        | p k = Just v
92        | otherwise = loop xs
93
94-- | Lookup assoc list that keys are truth-valued functions.
95lookupSatisfy :: a -> [(a -> Bool, b)] -> Maybe b
96lookupSatisfy x = loop where
97    loop [] = Nothing
98    loop ((p, v) : ps)
99        | p x = Just v
100        | otherwise = loop ps
101
102-- | Create lookup function for fixed association list.
103--
104--   >>> let f = assocFinder [('a', "apple"), ('b', "banana")]
105--   >>> f 'a'
106--   Just "apple"
107--
108assocFinder :: (Ord k) => [(k, v)] -> k -> Maybe v
109assocFinder xs k = Map.lookup k $ Map.fromList xs
110
111
112-- ----------------------  Tuple-like operator
113
114-- | Pick up associations that have given keys.
115--
116--   >>> assocPick ["a","c"] [("a",1), ("b",2), ("c",3)]
117--   [("a",1), ("c",3)]
118assocPick :: (Eq k) => [k] -> O.Map [(k, a)]
119assocPick xs = loop where
120    loop [] = []
121    loop (kv@(key, _) : kvs)
122        | key `elem` xs = kv : loop kvs
123        | otherwise     =      loop kvs
124
125-- | Cut off associations that have given keys.
126--
127--   >>> assocCut ["a","c"] [("a",1), ("b",2), ("c",3)]
128--   [("b",2)]
129--
130assocCut :: (Eq k) => [k] -> O.Map [(k, a)]
131assocCut ks xs = foldr assocCut1 xs ks
132
133-- | Single key version of 'assocCut'.
134--
135--   >>> assocCut1 "b" [("a",1), ("b",2), ("c",3)]
136--   [("a",1), ("c",3)]
137--
138assocCut1 :: (Eq k) => k -> O.Map [(k, a)]
139assocCut1 k1 = loop where
140    loop [] = []
141    loop (x@(k2, _) : xs)
142        | k1 == k2   =  xs
143        | otherwise  =  x : loop xs
144
145-- | Change key of assoc list.
146--
147--   >>> assocRename1 "x" "a" [("a",1), ("b",2), ("c",3)]
148--   [("x",1), ("b",2), ("c",3)]
149--
150assocRename1 :: (Eq k) => k -> k -> O.Map [(k, a)]
151assocRename1 new old = map r where
152    r (k, x) | k == old  = (new, x)
153             | otherwise = (k, x)
154
155-- | Compose two assocs.
156--
157--   >>> assocCompose [("A","H"), ("B","J")] [("H","P"), ("H","Q"), ("I","R"), ("J","S")]
158--   [("A","P"), ("A","Q"), ("B","S")]
159--
160assocCompose :: (Eq b) => [(a, b)] -> [(b, c)] -> [(a, c)]
161assocCompose ab bc =
162    [ (a, c) | (a, b)  <- ab
163             , (b', c) <- bc
164             , b == b' ]
165
166-- | Meet two assocs.
167--
168--   >>> assocMeet [("A","H"), ("B","J")] [("H","P"), ("H","Q"), ("I","R"), ("J","S")]
169--   [("A","H","P"), ("A","H","Q"), ("B","J","S")]
170--
171assocMeet :: (Eq b) => [(a, b)] -> [(b, c)] -> [(a, b, c)]
172assocMeet ab bc =
173    [ (a, b, c) | (a, b)  <- ab
174                , (b', c) <- bc
175                , b == b' ]
176
177
178-- ----------------------  Gather
179
180-- | Snip /b/ from sequence /a/.
181type Gather a b = a -> (b, a)
182
183-- | Gather what is gotten by splitter.
184gather :: Gather [a] b -> [a] -> [b]
185gather one = loop where
186    loop [] = []
187    loop xs = let (y, xs2) = one xs
188              in y : loop xs2
189
190-- gatherWith :: (c -> Gather [a] b) -> [c] -> [a] -> [b]
191-- gatherWith f = loop where
192--     loop [] _ = []
193--     loop _ [] = []
194--     loop (c:cs) as = let (b, as') = f c as
195--                      in b : loop cs as'
196
197-- | Gather (/k/, /v/) to 'Map.Map' /k/ [/v/].
198--
199--   >>> gatherToMap [(1 :: Int, 'a'), (2, 'b'), (1, 'c')]
200--   fromList [(1,"ca"),(2,"b")]
201--
202gatherToMap :: (Ord k) => [(k,v)] -> Map.Map k [v]
203gatherToMap xs = loop xs Map.empty where
204    loop [] m = m
205    loop ((k,v) : xs2) m =
206        case Map.lookup k m of
207          Just vs -> loop xs2 $ Map.insert k (v:vs) m
208          Nothing -> loop xs2 $ Map.insert k [v] m
209
210-- gatherToMap :: (Ord k) => [(k,v)] -> Map.Map k [v]
211-- gatherToMap = foldr gath Map.empty where
212--     gath (k,v) = Map.alter (add v) k
213--
214--     add v (Just vs) = Just $ v:vs
215--     add v (Nothing) = Just [v]
216
217-- | Gather (/v/, /k/) to 'Map.Map' /k/ [/v/].
218gatherToMapSwap :: (Ord k) => [(v,k)] -> Map.Map k [v]
219gatherToMapSwap = foldr gath Map.empty where
220    gath (v,k) = Map.alter (add v) k
221
222    add v (Just vs) = Just $ v:vs
223    add v (Nothing) = Just [v]
224
225-- | Gather values of duplicable associations.
226--
227--   >>> gatherToAssoc [(1 :: Int, 'a'), (2, 'b'), (1, 'c')]
228--   [(1,"ca"), (2,"b")]
229--
230gatherToAssoc :: (Ord k) => [(k,v)] -> [(k, [v])]
231gatherToAssoc = Map.assocs . gatherToMap
232
233-- | Gather values of duplicable associations.
234--
235--   >>> gatherToAssocOrder [(1 :: Int, 'a'), (2, 'b'), (1, 'c')]
236--   [(1,"ac"),(2,"b")]
237--
238gatherToAssocOrder :: (Ord k) => [(k,v)] -> [(k, [v])]
239gatherToAssocOrder xs = reverse O.<$$> gatherToAssoc xs
240
